CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Order_ERP_Xom_ID__c )),HYPERLINK("https://erp.xometry.com/quotes-orders?start=0&length=50&order%5B0%5D%5B%5D=4&order%5B0%5D%5B%5D=desc&search%5Bsearch%5D="+Order_ERP_Xom_ID__c+"&n_columns=" + $Label.Orders_Datatable_Column_Length,"Go to this Order in the ERP", "_blank"),"")
CustomField.label: ERP Order Url
